title: QUESTION ABOUT RANKEDS AND CLIENT CRASH
body:
Hello,
I just have a quick question:

Since alpha client is unstable and may crash during champ select, what happens if I play ranked? Am I going to get noticed by LeaverBuster and lose LP?

That would be a bummer and discourage me from trying rankeds in alpha. I don't mind losing 5 LP for crash if it helps testing and improving the client, but I never rage quit games and don't need any trouble with LeaverBuster.

replies.body: The legacy client has crashed on me more times than the alpha. Also just me or has the legacy client been crashing more than normal for the past few patches?

Ranked is not available in the client

idk what happens if you crash just at the end of champ select and the game does not launch
